source_objects.description: From hair styles to makeup tips, fashion tips to ageless secrets, welcome to the ultimate place for beauty & makeup courses.
source_objects.title: Beauty & Makeup

items.title: Learn varieties of facial scrubs from comfort of your home

visible_instructors.job_title: Entrepreneur, Diploma holder in soaps and cosmetics
visible_instructors.name: Praseela
visible_instructors.title: Praseela N

items.headline: How to make varieties of facial and body scrubs ( skin care course)
objectives_summary: You  will know how to choose the right carrier oil for making scrub base specific to your skin's needs.
You will know how to select the correct equipment for creating your scrubs.
You will learn how to formulate your own scrub base , and different variations of making scrubs upon the formulas provided in this class..

items.title: Beauty Makeup From a Technical Guy's Perspective
items.headline: Become the best version of yourself by learning makeup techniques designed for your unique facial features!
objectives_summary: How To Be The Best Version Of Yourself
How To Recreate Whichever Makeup Look On Your Unique Facial Features
Basic Eye Makeup Techniques For Your Eye Shape

items.title: Facelift to Go - No Botox or Dangerous Surgery

visible_instructors.job_title: Medical & Master Hypnotherapist, Acu Specialist. Author
visible_instructors.name: Patricia
visible_instructors.title: Patricia Gilmore

items.headline: Be Ever-Young - The Natural Non-Surgical Facelift - Acupressure, Face Exercises, Guided Imagery and Visual Diagnosis.
objectives_summary: To lift up your face and your spirit quickly, easily and with fun.  Be Ever-Young is a portable face-lift course on the go.  It works the whole you, the total you to help you look and feel your best.

items.title: Face Painting
items.headline: Learn to Face Paint
objectives_summary: How to face paint for parties events and festivals

items.title: Makeup: Becoming a Professional Hollywood Makeup Artist
items.headline: Learn from Makeup Industry Expert, Patty Bunch. Patti is the leading Makeup Artist working in Television and Film today.
objectives_summary: Gain knowledge on various terms and protocol for a Makeup Artist in the Entertainment Industry
Gain exposure to Supporting Resources that help Connect Makeup Artists to the Entertainment Industry
Understand the Business of being Makeup Artist

items.title: Grooming and Designing the Perfect Eyebrows
items.headline: Become a brow master and have a confidence to design a perfect brow.
objectives_summary: You will learn to design perfect brow
You will learn to arch your eyebrows
You will learn to figure out perfect eyebrow shape

items.title: Mastering The Brow: Shape and Arch

visible_instructors.job_title: Makeup Artist, Educator, and CEO of CharisJoyBeauty
visible_instructors.name: Charis
visible_instructors.title: Charis Ruth

items.headline: Learn how to sculpt your brows using basic techniques.
objectives_summary: Spot unhealthy brows
Choose the right tools needed to correct eyebrows
Clean up brows

items.title: The Secrets to Curling Hair- Curling Iron, Wand & Flat Iron
items.headline: This Course Will Teach You How To Create Beautiful Curls Using Traditional Curling Iron, A Wand and A Flat Iron!
objectives_summary: How To Curl Hair
Curling Hair With A Flat Iron
Curling Hair With A Want

items.title: Professional haircuts for men (barber)
items.headline: Men's Hair Cutting Techniques (The formula of perfect haircut)
objectives_summary: Learn to be a professional hairstylist from scratch
Learn two grads: classic and professional

items.title: HOW TO: USE BODY SCRUBS
items.headline: Exfoliating made easy for that fresh skin glow
objectives_summary: How to perform a body exfoliation treatment to boost circulation in the comfort of their own home or on a client

items.title: Spray Tan Qualification
items.headline: Fully Accredited Spray Tan Qualification
objectives_summary: You will learn how to give a full body Spray Tan within a commercially acceptable time.  You will gain a qualification that will enable you to start your own spray tan business.

items.title: Facial Cupping for Beginners
items.headline: Learn how to do facial cupping the right way with licensed acupuncturist Sakina Di Pace
objectives_summary: How to look younger, healthier and more radiant within just weeks
How to stimulate the lymphatic system, boost collagen production naturally, eliminate fine lines and wrinkles
BONUS Module: Cupping for Cellulite

items.title: MODERN NAIL ART WITH GEL
items.headline: Learn the latest, effective techniques used in salon work
objectives_summary: How to create trendy and realistic looking nail art that is hot right now !
Students will learn the technique that are used professionally in the salons using GEL
Step-by-step  Agate & Natural Quartz Effect on Nails

items.title: Herbalism - Herbs For Haircare
items.headline: How To Use Herbs For Beautiful Hair
objectives_summary: Learn about herbs that can highlight your natural hair color, making it brighter and shinier.  Learn about herbs that can effectively cover grey hairs.
Learn about herbs for cleansing and moisturising the hair and scalp that you can use in place of commercial shampoos and conditioners.
Learn about herbs to use on your specific hair texture to make styling easier.

items.title: Haircuts at Home: Women's One Length Haircut
items.headline: Learn how to cut your girls hair at home!
objectives_summary: You will learn how to trim your hair
Learn how to cut your own bangs
Learn how to curl your hair using a straightener

items.title: COMPLETE BRIDAL MAKEUP COURSE 2020 - Beginners & Pros!
items.headline: Whether Your A Beginner Or A Professional You Will Be Learning How To Perfect 3 Gorgeous Bridal Looks With Pro Tips!
objectives_summary: How To Apply Beautiful Soft Glamorous Bridal Makeup On Your Wedding Day Without Stress!
How To Create The Perfect Bridal Makeup Look On Clients That They Will Feel Confident In
Being The Best Bridal Makeup Artist In Your Area With These Tips
